text: Amazing food and descent prices. Staff is friendly and quick. My go to for Chinese takeout in the neighborhood. Love the pineapple chicken. Family owned and operated.
Friendly service and good food.  Not too salty. Try their dumplings,  wings, chicken fried rice, shanghai noodle dishes - they are all good!
I just did take out fried rice and dumpling and it was very tasty.  I will try other dishes next time I visit.

Good quality food, some family ordered and picked up from here for takeout.  I didn't see the place - only the food - but it was really tasty and good quality.  Would recommend them for Chinese takeout.
